update message_inf
SENDER_ID = #{senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update message_inf set SENDER_ID = #{senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_TIME = #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BORROW_RES = #{borrowRes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, M_TYPE = #{mType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, M_BORROW_ID = #{mBorrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
